Come on in! How to start using the space at Cowork Niagara.

First: Pick a membership

Cowork Niagara is a co-operative. That means you need to be a member in order to use the space.

Pricing and Packages

  • Flex Card

    • 8 visits any time over one year
    • $100.00per flex card

  • Core Package

    • Full-time access
    • $100.00monthly
